name: Script Rehearser Script File
summary: Learn about .RHR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: RHR files are created when a user saves a script in Script Rehearser. Scripts can be configured by a user to fit certain learning methods, such as "listen along," "wait for me," "repeat for confirmation," and "run through."
RHR files are meant to be opened by Script Rehearser. But they can also be opened by text editors since RHR files are saved in an XML format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
